scene_description_enriched: A haloed male figure, likely a saint, stands in a landscape. He wears a golden tunic with pleats and a white, ruffled undersleeve. In his right hand, he holds a grid-like object, possibly a tool or a symbol of martyrdom. The background depicts a blue sky with stylized clouds and distant, pale blue architectural structures, suggesting a city or town. Green foliage is visible in the foreground.
